img_summary: The image shows a detailed illustration of a ginseng root. The root is depicted with multiple long, thin tendrils extending from its main body, resembling limbs. The background is blurred, featuring muted colors and indistinct shapes, possibly suggesting a traditional or historical setting. The focus is on the ginseng root, highlighting its unique and intricate form.
